slides.title: Font Family and Size
slides.content:
# Typography ðŸ“

## Font Family
Priority list of fonts.
```css
body {
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
}
```
If the browser doesn't have the first, it tries the second.

## Font Size
```css
h1 { font-size: 32px; }
p  { font-size: 1.2rem; } /* Relative to root size */
```

> ðŸ’¡ **Tip:** Using `rem` is better for accessibility than `px`.

slides.title: Weight and Style
slides.content:
# Styling Text ðŸ–Œï¸

## Font Weight
Boldness of the text.
```css
font-weight: normal; /* 400 */
font-weight: bold;   /* 700 */
font-weight: 100;    /* Thin */
```

## Font Style
Italicizing text.
```css
font-style: italic;
```

## Text Decoration
Lines on text.
```css
text-decoration: underline;
text-decoration: line-through;
text-decoration: none; /* Removes link underline */
```

slides.title: Alignment and Spacing
slides.content:
# Alignment & Spacing ðŸ“

## Text Align
Horizontal alignment.
```css
text-align: center;
text-align: right;
text-align: justify;
```

## Spacing
```css
line-height: 1.5;      /* Space between lines */
letter-spacing: 2px;   /* Space between chars */
word-spacing: 5px;     /* Space between words */
```
